title: MMO Game Magic - Spell Sound Effects
description: Calling all audio wizards, sound designers, and audio effects shamans. Introducing MMO Game Magic sound effects library – a highly versatile and wide-ranging anthology of fantasy magic spells and user interface styled sounds.
longDescription:
Audio Demo

Easy to Use Sound Effects for Film, Games and Video

Inspired by hit computer games like World of Warcraft and Diablo, MMO Game Magic, is an expertly crafted and imagined spellbook of natural, minimal to hybrid & highly processed magical game audio assets that will complete almost any project where fantasy or magical assets are required. The library is also organized into popular categories that make it easier to create outstanding fantasy gaming experiences in the following spell/sound type: Acid, Dark, Earth, Fire, Holy, Frost, Lightning, Water, & Wind.

Super easy to use in animations, video games, mobile apps, fantasy productions, motion graphics, film, and software.


MMO Game Magic includes 500 designed game ready audio assets & sound effects such as elemental earth magic, arcane projectiles, dark conjures, fire & ice spells, pulsing holy casts, Zeus inspired SFX, shadow & dark casts and spells for demons or shamans, acidic poison burns, attacks, and magic, & a tome of versatile supernatural SFX that can be used for UI taps, buttons, clicks, buffs, power-ups, whooshes, transitions, collects, magic items, touches, hits, and more. Voice and background music not included. Enlist the wizard you hear in the audio demo trailer for a very reasonable wage here – AAA Game Character Wizard.

Plus the sound library includes 1300 organic hits, movements, textures, layers, foley, field recordings & more.
technicalDetails:
Product details:

  • 1800 sound effects
  • 500 designed magic game sounds
  • 1300 source/organic sounds to build your own magic spells
  • Everything you need for fantasy games, spells, & magic FX
  • 2.02 GB of audio samples
  • 58 minutes of sound
  • 50 acid/poison magic spells, casts, AOE effects, impacts, whooshes, & projectiles
  • 50 defensive spells impacts, casts, spells & more
  • 50 dark evil shadow spells, casts, whooshes, & more
  • 50 elemental earth & nature spells
  • 50 fire spells, casts, impacts, whooshes & more
  • 50 holy spells, casts, area, projectiles & more
  • 50 frost spells, casts, whooshes & more
  • 50 lightning spells, casts, impacts, whooshes & more
  • 50 water spells, area, casts, whooshes, hits & more
  • 50 wind spells, casts, loops, whooshes & more
  • 1300 source audio sound effects for creating your own custom magical game sounds
  • like modular buzzes, liquid, short circuits, textures, layers
  • acid liquid boils, movements, chains, the wooden chest opens, chimes, bells
  • crackles, cymbals, dirt, ice, foley, metals, organic impacts, paper, coins
  • soda, steam, processed wind, whooshes, goop, shakes, pours, fizz
  • swords, radio interference, analog & modular, processed material, field recordings
  • & much more!
  • All royalty-free
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)

Number of Audio Waves: 1800

Number of Audio Cues: 1800

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k, 16bit

Minutes of audio provided: 58
